scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 2022.pycon.am > ./dist/CNAME  && gh-pages -d dist --repo git@github.com:PYerevan/conf-22.git --branch gh-pages
scripts.deployHttps: npm run build && echo 2022.pycon.am > ./dist/CNAME  && gh-pages -d dist --repo https://github.com/PYerevan/conf-22.git --branch gh-pages
scripts.deployMain: npm run build && echo pycon.am > ./dist/CNAME && gh-pages -d dist --repo git@github.com:PYerevan/pycon.am.git --branch gh-pages
scripts.deployMainHttps: npm run build && echo pycon.am > ./dist/CNAME && gh-pages -d dist --repo https://github.com/PYerevan/pycon.am.git --branch gh-pages
